str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From hupo and tasso; to subordinate; reflexively, to obey.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The foot. A primary word; a 'foot'.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
When, whenever. From hote and an; whenever; also causatively inasmuch as.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

str2: From hupo and tasso; to subordinate; reflexively, to obey.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
Clear, manifest, evident. Of uncertain derivation; clear.
From ek; the exterior; figuratively aside from, besides.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: From hupo and tasso; to subordinate; reflexively, to obey.
